analysis.Summary: Vue single-file component that renders a clock/time SVG icon.
analysis.Purpose: Provide a reusable time/clock icon in the UI, customizable via CSS classes passed through component attributes.

Components.name: IconTime
Components.responsibility: Render an SVG clock icon with a configurable CSS class

Dependencies: Vue runtime (for template compilation and attribute inheritance)
Notes: Uses v-bind ($attrs.class) on the <path> to allow dynamic CSS class injection.
SVG dimensions are fixed at 50×49 but can be overridden by external CSS if needed.
